Detailed Description

The type defines network join method and joining settings.

Definition at line 417 of file nwkCommon.h.

Field Documentation

NWK_JoinMethod_t _NWK_JoinControl_t::method

The method of joining the network.

Definition at line 420 of file nwkCommon.h.

bool _NWK_JoinControl_t::secured

If this parameter is TRUE than NWK layer will encrypt all NWK packet during join procedure. It means that if the method parameter is equal to NWK_JOIN_VIA_REJOIN than NWK layer will encrypt rejoin request command and will expect encrypted rejoin response command.

Definition at line 425 of file nwkCommon.h.

bool _NWK_JoinControl_t::discoverNetworks

TRUE means that NWK performs active scan to discover networks in neighborhood otherwise NWK uses the neighbor table as is. In that case (FALSE value), you can put all known neighbors to the neighbor table before join and NWK will try to join only to these neighbors.

Definition at line 430 of file nwkCommon.h.

bool _NWK_JoinControl_t::annce

Notify other ZigBee devices that the device has joined or re-joined the network.

Definition at line 432 of file nwkCommon.h.

bool _NWK_JoinControl_t::clearNeighborTable

The flag indicates that the neighbor table must be cleared or not.
